bug.author: tamuhey
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
>>> from spacy.gold import align >>> tokens_a=["ab","c"] >>> tokens_b=["a","b","c"] >>> align(tokens_a, tokens_b) (2, array([-1, 2], dtype=int32), array([-1, -1, 1], dtype=int32), {}, {}) I think j2i_multi (the last of returned items) should be {0:0:,1:0} <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: mac OSX Python Version Used: 3.7 spaCy Version Used: master

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
